General.Name: Star Holdings
General.Description: Star Holdings engages in the non-ground lease real estate assets business in the United States. Its portfolio comprises Asbury Park Waterfront and Magnolia Green residential development projects. The company also engages in the asset management; sale of existing loans; and operation of land and development properties. Star Holdings is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 1114 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY, United States, 10036

4.Name: Mr. Pearse  Hoffmann
